    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet Location_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Location_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Location xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <AddressDetail language="en" role="Home" validInd="true">
        <AddressLine>111 Travers St, Dun Laoghaire Co. Dublin Ireland</AddressLine>
        <BldgRoom buldingInd="true">Bldg H</BldgRoom>
        <Number pO_Box="98567499" ruralRouteNmbr="88" streetDirection="NNW" streetNmbrSuffix="B">563</Number>
        <Street>Travers Street</Street>
        <City>Dublin</City>
        <County>Fairfax</County>
        <StateProv name="Texas">TX</StateProv>
        <Country name="Ireland">IR</Country>
        <PostalCode>32165-9999</PostalCode>
        <Remark>This address should be used for all official correspondences.</Remark>
        <Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
        <Type>Business</Type>
        <Use>Billing</Use>
    </AddressDetail>
    <Position altitude="Example String Value" altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum="Miles" formatURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00" latitude="Example String Value" longitude="Example String Value" mapURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/>
</Location>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Location" : {
    "Address" : {
      "@type" : "AddressDetail",
      "role" : "Home",
      "language" : "en",
      "validInd" : true,
      "AddressLine" : [ "111 Travers St, Dun Laoghaire Co. Dublin Ireland" ],
      "BldgRoom" : [ {
        "value" : "Bldg H",
        "buldingInd" : true
      } ],
      "Number" : {
        "value" : "563",
        "streetNmbrSuffix" : "B",
        "streetDirection" : "NNW",
        "ruralRouteNmbr" : "88",
        "pO_Box" : "98567499"
      },
      "Street" : "Travers Street",
      "City" : "Dublin",
      "County" : "Fairfax",
      "StateProv" : {
        "value" : "TX",
        "name" : "Texas"
      },
      "Country" : {
        "value" : "IR",
        "name" : "Ireland"
      },
      "PostalCode" : "32165-9999",
      "Remark" : "This address should be used for all official correspondences.",
      "Privacy" : {
        "value" : null,
        "shareMarketInd" : "Yes",
        "shareSyncInd" : "No",
        "optInStatus" : "OptedIn",
        "optInDate" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
        "optOutDate" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00"
      },
      "Type" : {
        "value" : "Business"
      },
      "Use" : {
        "value" : "Billing"
      }
    },
    "Position" : {
      "value" : null,
      "latitude" : "Example String Value",
      "longitude" : "Example String Value",
      "altitude" : "Example String Value",
      "altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum" : "Miles",
      "mapURL" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
      "formatURL" : "http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00"
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Address
        Public address of the property.
        Details
        Type Address
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required true
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Position
        An element that identifies the geographic position of the facility. The Position element uses the representation defined by ISO Standard 6709 to define a geographic point location.
        Details
        Type Geolocation
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
